title: Escape
directorstars: Director:Roar Uthaug     Stars:Isabel Christine Andreasen, Ingrid Bolsø Berdal, Milla Olin, Tobias Santelmann
story: Signe, spared from death to produce a child, befriends a little girl, Frigg, and escapes from the camp.

title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
directorstars: Director:Thor Freudenthal     Stars:Logan Lerman, Alexandra Daddario, Brandon T. Jackson, Nathan Fillion
story: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters, to find the mythical Golden Fleece, all the while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

title: Dota: Dragon's Blood
directorstars: Stars:Yuri Lowenthal, Lara Pulver, Dee Bradley Baker, Freya Tingley
story: After encounters with a dragon and a princess on her own mission, a Dragon Knight becomes embroiled in events larger than he could have ever imagined.

title: Furiosa
directorstars: Director:George Miller     Stars:Anya Taylor-Joy, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Chris Hemsworth
story: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before she teamed up with Mad Max in 'Fury Road'

title: Alex Rider
directorstars: Stars:Otto Farrant, Vicky McClure, Ace Bhatti, Brenock O'Connor
story: Alex Rider is an ordinary teenager enlisted to work on behalf of MI6, where he uses skills he didn't know he had to become an extraordinary spy.

title: 2-Headed Shark Attack
directorstars: Director:Christopher Ray     Stars:Carmen Electra, Charlie O'Connell, Brooke Hogan, Christina Bach
story: Survivors escape to a deserted atoll, after their boat during a Semester at Sea ship is sunk by a mutated two-headed shark. But when the atoll starts flooding, no one is safe from the double jaws of the monster.

title: Innerspace
directorstars: Director:Joe Dante     Stars:Dennis Quaid, Martin Short, Meg Ryan, Kevin McCarthy
story: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

title: Infinity Train
directorstars: Stars:Ashley Johnson, Owen Dennis, Jeremy Crutchley, Kirby Howell-Baptiste
story: Various people find themselves on a mysterious train with an endless number of cars, each one being its own universe, and they must find a way to get home in this animated anthology series.

title: Diamonds Are Forever
directorstars: Director:Guy Hamilton     Stars:Sean Connery, Jill St. John, Charles Gray, Lana Wood
story: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

title: 47 Meters Down
directorstars: Director:Johannes Roberts     Stars:Mandy Moore, Claire Holt, Matthew Modine, Chris Johnson
story: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

title: Vanguard
directorstars: Director:Stanley Tong     Stars:Jackie Chan, Yang Yang, Lun Ai, Miya Muqi
story: Covert security company Vanguard is the last hope of survival for an accountant after he is targeted by the world's deadliest mercenary organization.

title: Executive Decision
directorstars: Director:Stuart Baird     Stars:Kurt Russell, Halle Berry, Steven Seagal, John Leguizamo
story: When terrorists seize control of an airliner, an intelligence analyst accompanies a commando unit for a midair boarding operation.

title: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
directorstars: Director:Johannes Roberts     Stars:Sophie Nélisse, Corinne Foxx, Brianne Tju, Sistine Rose Stallone
story: Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.

title: The Fugitive
directorstars: Stars:David Janssen, William Conrad, Barry Morse, Paul Birch
story: A doctor, wrongly convicted for a murder he didn't commit, escapes custody and must stay ahead of the police to find the real killer.

title: xXx
directorstars: Director:Rob Cohen     Stars:Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson
story: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

title: Dragonball Evolution
directorstars: Director:James Wong     Stars:Justin Chatwin, James Marsters, Chow Yun-Fat, Emmy Rossum
story: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

title: Snakes on a Plane
directorstars: Director:David R. Ellis     Stars:Samuel L. Jackson, Julianna Margulies, Nathan Phillips, Rachel Blanchard
story: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly venomous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
directorstars: Director:David Lowery     Stars:Alan Tudyk, Jude Law, Molly Parker, Yara Shahidi
story: Live-action adaptation of J.M. Barrie's classic tale of a boy who wouldn't grow up and recruits three young siblings in London to join him on a magical adventure to the enchanted Neverland island.

title: Æon Flux
directorstars: Director:Karyn Kusama     Stars:Charlize Theron, Frances McDormand, Sophie Okonedo, Marton Csokas
story: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

title: The Legend of Zorro
directorstars: Director:Martin Campbell     Stars:Antonio Banderas, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Rufus Sewell, Alberto Reyes
story: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

title: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
directorstars: Directors:Colin Strause, Greg Strause     Stars:Reiko Aylesworth, Steven Pasquale, Shareeka Epps, John Ortiz
story: Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

title: Point Break
directorstars: Director:Ericson Core     Stars:Edgar Ramírez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer
story: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

title: The Mosquito Coast
directorstars: Director:Peter Weir     Stars:Harrison Ford, Helen Mirren, River Phoenix, Jadrien Steele
story: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

title: Mechanic: Resurrection
directorstars: Director:Dennis Gansel     Stars:Jason Statham, Jessica Alba, Tommy Lee Jones, Michelle Yeoh
story: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

title: You Only Live Twice
directorstars: Director:Lewis Gilbert     Stars:Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Mie Hama, Tetsurô Tanba
story: Secret Agent James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.

title: The Host
directorstars: Director:Andrew Niccol     Stars:Saoirse Ronan, Max Irons, Jake Abel, Diane Kruger
story: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

title: Race to Witch Mountain
directorstars: Director:Andy Fickman     Stars:Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, AnnaSophia Robb, Alexander Ludwig
story: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
directorstars: Director:Nicholas Meyer     Stars:William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan
story: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
directorstars: Director:Ronald Neame     Stars:Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Red Buttons
story: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

title: The Mountain Between Us
directorstars: Director:Hany Abu-Assad     Stars:Kate Winslet, Idris Elba, Beau Bridges, Dermot Mulroney
story: Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
directorstars: Director:Jan de Bont     Stars:Sandra Bullock, Jason Patric, Willem Dafoe, Temuera Morrison
story: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

title: The Grey
directorstars: Director:Joe Carnahan     Stars:Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo, Dallas Roberts
story: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

title: Moonraker
directorstars: Director:Lewis Gilbert     Stars:Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale, Richard Kiel
story: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

title: Priest
directorstars: Director:Scott Stewart     Stars:Paul Bettany, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q, Karl Urban
story: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

title: Maverick
directorstars: Director:Richard Donner     Stars:Mel Gibson, Jodie Foster, James Garner, Graham Greene
story: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: How I Became a Super Hero
directorstars: Director:Douglas Attal     Stars:Pio Marmaï, Vimala Pons, Benoît Poelvoorde, Leïla Bekhti
story: While superheroes have assimilated into Parisian society, a new drug gives super powers to mere mortals.

title: Vertical Limit
directorstars: Director:Martin Campbell     Stars:Scott Glenn, Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton, Robin Tunney
story: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

title: Record of Ragnarok
directorstars: Stars:Kellen Goff, Bill Butts, Paul Castro Jr., Ryan Colt Levy
story: Every 1000 years, the Gods' Council assemble to decide the fate of humanity. After 7 million years of human history, the gods come to the decision that humans are irredeemable and must be extinct.

title: Lord of the Flies
directorstars: Director:Harry Hook     Stars:Balthazar Getty, Chris Furrh, Danuel Pipoly, James Badge Dale
story: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

title: Brotherhood of the Wolf
directorstars: Director:Christophe Gans     Stars:Samuel Le Bihan, Mark Dacascos, Jérémie Renier, Vincent Cassel
story: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

title: Daylight
directorstars: Director:Rob Cohen     Stars:Sylvester Stallone, Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Dan Hedaya
story: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

title: Escape from L.A.
directorstars: Director:John Carpenter     Stars:Kurt Russell, Steve Buscemi, Stacy Keach, A.J. Langer
story: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

title: Poseidon
directorstars: Director:Wolfgang Petersen     Stars:Richard Dreyfuss, Kurt Russell, Emmy Rossum, Josh Lucas
story: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

title: Akame ga Kill!
directorstars: Stars:Sôma Saitô, Corey Hartzog, Sora Amamiya, Molly Searcy
story: A countryside boy named Tatsumi sets out on a journey to The Capital to make a name for himself and met a seemingly dangerous group of Assassins known as Night Raid. Their journey begins.

title: Flashpoint
directorstars: Stars:Hugh Dillon, Amy Jo Johnson, David Paetkau, Sergio Di Zio
story: The missions and trials of a Toronto police tactical unit.

title: Power Rangers Dino Fury
directorstars: Stars:Russell Curry, Hunter Deno, Kainalu Moya, Tessa Rao
story: When an army of powerful alien beings is unleashed on Earth threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the prehistoric power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

title: Never Say Never Again
directorstars: Director:Irvin Kershner     Stars:Sean Connery, Kim Basinger, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Max von Sydow
story: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

title: The Command
directorstars: Director:Thomas Vinterberg     Stars:Matthias Schoenaerts, Léa Seydoux, Peter Simonischek, August Diehl
story: The film follows the 2000 K-141 Kursk submarine disaster and the governmental negligence that followed. As the sailors fight for survival, their families desperately battle political obstacles and impossible odds to save them.

title: The Last of Us
directorstars: Directors:Neil Druckmann, Bruce Straley     Stars:Ashley Johnson, Troy Baker, Hana Hayes, Jeffrey Pierce
story: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.

title: Bacurau
directorstars: Directors:Juliano Dornelles, Kleber Mendonça Filho     Stars:Bárbara Colen, Thomas Aquino, Silvero Pereira, Thardelly Lima
story: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.
